trustfund:
TF036016-ECA REGION - WATER AND
            AGRICULTURE (ARMENIA, UZBEKISTAN),TF025793-PHRD-IRRIGATION DEVELOPMENT,TF029549-PHRD-AGRICULTURAL SUPPORT
            SERVICES PROJ.(BANK-EXEC.)

abstracts.cdata!:
The Irrigation Development Project for
            Armenia aims to rehabilitate and improve existing irrigation
            schemes and infrastructure. Potential impacts and their
            respective mitigation measures include: a) insufficient
            availability of water/sanitary flow - water permits; b)
            River flow, aquatic ecosystem disturbance - installation of
            flow meters and monitoring; c) fish migration barriers -
            building of new ladders; d) impacts of improper dredging and
            maintenance - use of mechanical shoveler/dredger; e)
            uncontrolled disposal of excavated materials - conduct waste
            sampling, prepare water management plans, and dispose of
            waste in accordance to said plans; f) sedimentation -
            acquire survey equipment and monitor sedimentation; g)
            degradation and impacts on cultural and natural monuments,
            sensitive habitats, health, and incidents of malaria -
            monitor the situations; h) impacts on water table and
            artificial lakes - drill monitoring wells; i) soil
            salinization - install hydroposts, acquire test kits,
            conduct a salinity survey, and monitor; j) loss of topsoil -
            acquire sewer televising equipment, and soil scratching
            vehicle; and k) loss of fruit trees - compensation to owners.
